```{r}
# 16 sample patients
ids <- c(455, 313, 345, 301, 17, 20, 208, 381, 389, 100, 254, 224, 
         280, 288, 398, 405)

xyplot(sqrt(CD4) ~ obstime | patient, data = aids, subset = patient %in% ids, 
       type = "l", col = 1, layout = c(4, 4), as.table = TRUE,
       xlab = "Time (months)",  
       ylab = "square root CD4 cell count")
```
